title: GG Auto Gears Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 34.01 crore, up 16.38% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for GG Automative Gears are:Net Sales at Rs 34.01 crore in December 2025 up 16.38% from Rs. 29.22 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 3.46 crore in December 2025 up 32.52% from Rs. 2.61 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 6.89 crore in December 2025 up 52.43% from Rs. 4.52 crore in December 2024. GG Auto Gears EPS has increased to Rs. 3.46 in December 2025 from Rs. 2.75 in December 2024. GG Auto Gears shares closed at 259.30 on January 12, 2026 (BSE) and has given 4.03% returns over the last 6 months and 68.71% over the last 12 months.
